reviews.review: sss neye bakıyon lan duvar var portal gun var neye bakıyon

Wow. Portal 2 is the best game ever made (in my opinion). If you haven't played it already, please do! But play Portal first.

Also, Valve please make Portal 3. Please.
Stephen Merchant is a funny ball
this one is better than the first part

i really really enjoyed the co-op 
in fact best co-op i played in a really really long time
hold on I gotta instal the game before we play alex
ТОТ МОМЕНТ КОГДА НЕ ПОЧУСТВОВАЛ КАК ВОШЕЛ
What this kind of game does ... it makes you think different !  Think out of the box !!
Best game ever best story line but u need to get the original portal to understand it.
Love this game. Some of the best voice acting.
Successful predecessor to the first game
ME PARECE UN JUEGO SUPER ENTRETENIDO , YA QUIERO QUE SAQUEN EL PORTAL 3
Great physics, great puzzles, great sense of humour.
Excelente, jugue el 1 hace ya varios años y este no decepciona en lo absoluto. Lo mejor es el modo cooperativo con un amigo. Hay puzzles que simplemente te romperan la cabeza.

An amazing game with an amazing backstory. I have played the game through twice and continue to play co-op with many different people. Recommended for people who love problem solving and long story lines. Not much to say about the game because I don't want to spoil it.
Jogo maravilhoso, divertido, desafiador, original. Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei, vale muito a pena ainda mais pelo preço
Было весело не возвращайся))) и тонкий намек на продолжение))))
this game has a such a interesting story.  but the main gameplay is kinda boring after few hours. still would recommend to try this game

Отличная игра
+ головоломки стали сложнее
+ интересный сюжет (15ч)
+ кооператив (с друзьями или случайным игроком)
+ шикарная русская озвучка
Trés cool et fun a jouer a 2 grâce a steam même une fois l'hisoire terminer des milliers de niveaux sont disponible car ils ont été crée par la communauté.
One of the best puzzle game.
This game is a great improvement of the first game, it has a good story, puzzles, lore, and co-op multiplayer levels, which also has a story! Best 3 euros spent on a game ever for me :)
Amazing concept, impressive graphics for the time, killer soundtrack, easy to run, great story, yep, this game's the whole package.
Игра прекрасна, после жудкой Half-Life 2, это игра очень весёлая и приятная!!! Всем советую!!!
I give you cake if you buying portal 2
Очень интересная головоломка! Намного лучше первой части, особенно в плане русской озвучки) Всем очеь рекомендую!!!!
o modo cooperativo é muito bom e o modo de um jogador também
bardzo fajna gra logiczna z ciekawą fabułą
Probably one of the best puzzle games ever made!

剧情很有意思，话说我一开始以为没有剧情2333
多人游戏非常有意思。单人的话卡关就有点难受，毕竟查攻略会影响体验

Well here we are again
It's always such a pleasure
Remember when you tried
to kill me twice?

Oh how we laughed and laughed
Except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice

You want your freedom?
Take it
That's what I'm counting on
I used to want you dead
but
Now I only want you gone

She was a lot like you
(Maybe not quite as heavy)
Now little Caroline is in here too

One day they woke me up
So I could live forever
It's such a shame the same
will never happen to you

You've got your
short sad life left
That's what I'm counting on
I'll let you get right to it
Now I only want you gone

Goodbye my only friend
Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would be funny
if it weren't so sad

Well you have been replaced
I don't need anyone now
When I delete you maybe
I'll stop feeling so bad

Go make some new disaster
That's what I'm counting on
You're someone else's problem
Now I only want you gone
Now I only want you gone
Now I only want you gone
Немного лучше чем 1 часть, намного дольше проходиться. Короче 1 и 2 часть рекомендую.

스토리는 두말할거 없습니다.
같은 벨브사의 하프라이프 시리즈와 유명한 대작으로 많이 알려져 있지만 어려울거같아 많은 사람들이 도전을 못 하는 작품인거같아 아쉽습니다.
하지만 플레이 하다보면 생각보다 쉽고 한 챕터마다 클리어 할 시 쾌감이 이루 말할수 없이 좋습니다.
또한 스토리를 다 보고 맵을 직접 만드는 모드나, 다른 사람과 같이 플레이할 수 있는 2인모드 또한 매우 재밌으므로    퍼즐게임에 관심이 있으신 분들은 꼭 한번씩 사서 해보시길 권합니다.
No matter how many paradoxes I exposed GLaDOS to the potato was never properly cooked. Not happy.

если есть мозги, то эта игра для вас!
PS:я прошёл ей за два дня гыг

Un jeu incroyable. Passé la campagne, qui possède une histoire construite et un gameplay assez innovant par rapport au premier, vous pourrez toujours vous amuser avec vos amis ou des étrangers sur le mode coop. Et les niveaux de l'utilisateurs, il y en a des centaines de milliers tous uniques les uns des autres. Si vous n'y avais jamais joué, je vous le recommande vivement.
